backup.description:
Create a backup, append a provided string to the filename extension or
a timestamp if value is not a string, only apply if the target file
exists and is modified.

load.description: Activate properties in the system if target is modified.

merge.description: Preserve existing variables in the target file.

properties.description: Key/value object representing sysctl properties and values.

target.description:
Destination to write properties and load in sysctl settings, default
to "/etc/sysctl.conf" if none given.
